00017 template<
00018   class STRING_TYPE = string,
00019   uint64_t CACHE_LENGTH = 1000000,//bytes
00020   class CacheType = CachePolicyLARU,
00021   typename STRING_TYPE::value_type* ALPHABET = a2z,
00022   uint32_t ALPHABET_SIZE = a2z_size
00023   >
00024 class NodeCache
00025 {
00026 public:
00027   typedef AlphabetNode<typename STRING_TYPE::value_type, ALPHABET, ALPHABET_SIZE> NodeType;
00028 
00029 protected:
00030   struct _cache_node_
00031   {
00032     CacheType cacheInfo_;
00033     NodeType* pNode_;
00034     bool locked_;
00035 
00036     inline _cache_node_(NodeType* p)
00037     {
00038       pNode_ = p;
00039       locked_ = false;
00040     }
00041     inline _cache_node_()
00042     {
00043       pNode_ = NULL;
00044       locked_ = false;
00045     }
00046     
00047     
00048   }
00049     ;
00050 #define CACHE_SIZE (CACHE_LENGTH/(sizeof(struct _cache_node_)+NodeType::SIZE_)) 
00051   
00052   
00053 public:
00054   typedef NodeCache <STRING_TYPE, CACHE_LENGTH, CacheType, ALPHABET, ALPHABET_SIZE> SelfType;
00055   
00056   class nodePtr
00057   {
00058   public:
00059     nodePtr()
00060     {      
00061       pN_ = NULL;
00062       pC_ = NULL;
00063       idx_ = (uint32_t)-1;
00064 
00065     }
00066     
00067     nodePtr(struct _cache_node_& n, uint32_t idx)
00068     {
00069       pN_ = n.pNode_;
00070       pC_ = &n.cacheInfo_;
00071       idx_ = idx;
00072     }
00073     
00074     NodeType* operator ->()
00075     {
00076       pC_->visit();
00077       if (pN_ ==NULL)
00078         cout<<"Node is not exist!\n";//Throw exception
00079       return pN_;
00080     }
00081 
00082     void eleminate()
00083     {
00084       if (pN_ != NULL)
00085         delete pN_;
00086 
00087       pN_ = NULL;
00088     }
00089     
00090     uint32_t getIndex() const
00091     {
00092       return idx_;
00093     }
00094 
00095     bool isNull()const
00096     {
00097       return pN_==NULL;
00098     }
00099     
00100   protected:
00101     NodeType* pN_;
00102     CacheType* pC_;
00103     uint32_t idx_;
00104   }
00105     ;
00106 
00111   NodeCache(FILE* f, uint64_t rootAddr)
00112     :f_(f),rootAddr_(rootAddr),count_(0)
00113   {
00114     //cout<<NodeType::SIZE_ <<"///////"<<CACHE_SIZE<<endl;
00115     nodes  = new struct _cache_node_ [CACHE_SIZE];
00116   }
00117 
00118   ~NodeCache()
00119   {
00120     for (uint32_t i=0; i<CACHE_SIZE; i++)
00121       if (nodes[i].pNode_ != NULL)
00122       {
00123         delete nodes[i].pNode_;
00124         nodes[i].pNode_ = NULL;
00125       }
00126     delete [] nodes;
00127   }
00128 
00132   uint32_t load()
00133   {
00134     vector<uint32_t> indexes;
00135     indexes.push_back(0);
00136 
00137     
00138     NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00139     t->load(rootAddr_);
00140     nodes[count_] = _cache_node_(t);
00141     count_++;
00142       
00143     while (indexes.size()>0)
00144     {
00145       load_(indexes);
00146     }
00147 
00148     return count_;
00149   }
00150   
00151   void load_(vector<uint32_t>& indexes)
00152   {
00153     uint32_t idx = indexes.front();
00154     indexes.erase(indexes.begin());
00155     
00156     NodeType* n = nodes[idx].pNode_ ;
00157     nodes[idx] =  _cache_node_(n);
00158     
00159     for (uint32_t i=0; i<n->getSize();i++)
00160     {
00161       if (n->getDiskAddr(i)==(uint64_t)-1)
00162         continue;
00163       
00164       if (n->getDiskAddr(i)%2==0)
00165         continue;
00166       
00167       NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00168       t->load(n->getDiskAddr(i));
00169       nodes[count_] = _cache_node_(t);
00170       
00171       indexes.push_back(count_);
00172       n->setMemAddr(i, count_);
00173       
00174       count_++;
00175       if (count_>=CACHE_SIZE)
00176       {
00177         indexes.clear();
00178         return;
00179       }
00180       
00181     }
00182   }
00183 
00187   uint32_t reload()
00188   {
00189     for(uint32_t i=0; i<CACHE_SIZE; i++)
00190     {
00191       if (nodes[i].pNode_ != NULL)
00192       {
00193         delete nodes[i].pNode_;
00194         nodes[i].pNode_ = NULL;
00195       }
00196       
00197     }
00198     count_ = 0;
00199     
00200     return load();
00201   }
00202   
00203 
00204 friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& os, const SelfType& node)
00205   {
00206     for(uint32_t i=0; i<node.count_; i++)
00207     {
00208       os<<"\n****************"<<i<<"****************\n";
00209       if (node.nodes[i].pNode_==NULL)
00210         continue;
00211       os<<node.nodes[i].cacheInfo_;
00212       os<<*node.nodes[i].pNode_;
00213     }
00214 
00215     return os;
00216     
00217   }
00218 
00219   
00223   uint32_t findSwitchOut() const
00224   {
00225     uint32_t minIdx = 1;
00226     while(minIdx<count_ && nodes[minIdx].locked_)
00227       minIdx++;
00228     if (minIdx==count_)
00229       cout<<"All locked up, Why?\n";
00230     
00231     for (uint32_t i=count_-1; i>0; i--)
00232     {
00233       if (nodes[i].pNode_==NULL)
00234         return i;
00235       
00236       if (!nodes[i].locked_ && nodes[i].cacheInfo_.compare(nodes[minIdx].cacheInfo_)<0)
00237       {
00238         minIdx = i;
00239       }
00240       
00241     }
00242 
00243     return minIdx;
00244   }
00245 
00249   void lockNode(uint32_t memAddr)
00250   {
00251     nodes[memAddr].locked_ = true;
00252   }
00253 
00257   void unlockNode(uint32_t memAddr)
00258   {
00259     nodes[memAddr].locked_ = false;
00260   }
00261 
00265   uint32_t getCount()const
00266   {
00267     return count_;
00268   }
00269 
00273   nodePtr getNodeByMemAddr(uint32_t& memAddr, uint64_t diskAddr)
00274   {
00275     if (diskAddr%2==0)
00276       return nodePtr();
00277     
00278     if (memAddr>=count_ && memAddr!=(uint32_t)-1 && count_!=0)
00279     {
00280       return nodePtr();
00281     }
00282     
00283     if (memAddr!=(uint32_t)-1)
00284     {
00285       NodeType* t = nodes[memAddr].pNode_;
00286       if (t!=NULL && t->getDiskAddr()==diskAddr)
00287         return nodePtr(nodes[memAddr], memAddr);
00288     }
00289 
00290     if (count_<CACHE_SIZE)
00291     {      
00292       NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00293       t->load(diskAddr);
00294       nodes[count_] = _cache_node_(t);
00295       
00296       memAddr = count_;
00297       
00298       count_++;
00299       return nodePtr(nodes[memAddr], memAddr);
00300     }
00301 
00302     memAddr = findSwitchOut();
00303     //cout<<"\nswitch out-: "<<memAddr<<endl;
00304     kickOutNodes(memAddr);
00305     
00306     
00307     NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00308     t->load(diskAddr);
00309     nodes[memAddr] = _cache_node_(t);
00310     return nodePtr(nodes[memAddr], memAddr);
00311   }
00312 
00313   
00317   nodePtr newNode(uint64_t diskAddr)
00318   {
00319     if (count_<CACHE_SIZE)
00320     {
00321       NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00322       t->load(diskAddr);
00323       nodes[count_] = _cache_node_(t);
00324       nodePtr p(nodes[count_]);
00325       count_++;
00326       return p;
00327     }
00328 
00329     
00330     uint32_t ret = findSwitchOut();
00331     kickOutNodes(ret);
00332     
00333     NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00334     t->load(diskAddr);
00335     nodes[ret] = _cache_node_(t);
00336     nodePtr p(nodes[ret]);
00337     return p;
00338 
00339   }
00340 
00344   nodePtr newNode()
00345   {
00346     //cout<<"newNode "<<CACHE_SIZE<<endl;
00347     
00348     if (count_<CACHE_SIZE)
00349     {
00350       NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00351       nodes[count_] = _cache_node_(t);
00352       nodePtr p(nodes[count_], count_);
00353       count_++;
00354       return p;
00355     }
00356 
00357     
00358     uint32_t ret = findSwitchOut();
00359     //cout<<"\nswitch out: "<<ret<<endl;
00360     kickOutNodes(ret);
00361     
00362     NodeType* t = new NodeType(f_);
00363     nodes[ret] = _cache_node_(t);
00364     nodePtr p(nodes[ret], ret);
00365     return p;
00366 
00367   }
00368 
00369 
00373   uint64_t kickOutNodes(uint32_t memAddr)
00374   {
00375     // cout<<"KickOutNodes(): ";
00376 //     cout<<count_<<"  "<<CACHE_SIZE<<"  "<<memAddr<<endl;
00377     
00378     if (memAddr==(uint32_t)-1 || nodes[memAddr].pNode_ == NULL)
00379       return (uint64_t)-1;
00380 
00381     uint64_t last_disk = -1;
00382     for (uint32_t i=0; i<nodes[memAddr].pNode_->getSize(); i++)
00383     {
00384       uint32_t m = nodes[memAddr].pNode_->getMemAddr(i);
00385       uint64_t d = nodes[memAddr].pNode_->getDiskAddr(i);
00386       //    cout<<memAddr<<"    "<<m<<"   "<<d<<"pppp\n";
00387 
00388       if (d==(uint64_t)-1 || d==last_disk || m == (uint32_t)-1
00389           || nodes[m].pNode_==NULL || d%2==0 || nodes[m].pNode_->getDiskAddr()!=d )
00390       {
00391         last_disk = d;
00392         continue;
00393       }
00394       
00395 
00396       last_disk = d;
00397       if (m==memAddr)
00398         cout<<i<<" kick out sub nodes: "<<m<<"  "<<d<<endl;
00399       
00400       kickOutNodes(m);
00401       //nodes[memAddr].pNode_->setDiskAddr(i, 2);
00402       //nodes[memAddr].pNode_->setDiskAddr(i, kickOutNodes(m));
00403     }
00404 
00405     uint64_t ret = nodes[memAddr].pNode_->update2disk();
00406     delete nodes[memAddr].pNode_;
00407     nodes[memAddr].pNode_ = NULL;
00408     nodes[memAddr]=  _cache_node_();
00409 
00410     return ret;
00411     
00412   }
00413 
00417   void flush()
00418   {
00419     for (uint32_t i=0; i<CACHE_SIZE; i++)
00420       if (nodes[i].pNode_ != NULL)
00421         nodes[i].pNode_->update2disk();
00422 
00423     fflush(f_);
00424   }
00425 
00426   
00427   bool isFull()
00428   {
00429     return count_>=CACHE_SIZE;
00430   }
00431

00433   FILE* f_;
00434   uint32_t rootAddr_;
00435   uint32_t count_;

00438 }
